description:
Vinyl enthusiast Natalie Sharp decided to turn her face into some of the most iconic album sleeves from Nirvana to the Velvet Underground唱片爱好者纳塔利•莎普把自己的脸画成一些最有标志性的唱片封面，从涅槃乐队到地下丝绒乐队应有尽有
 
As any fan of vinyl knows, some albums sleeves are true masterpieces.唱片爱好者都知道，有些唱片的封面算得上是真正的杰作。
 
And music fan Natalie Sharp, 33, decided to pay tribute to some of the best by recreating the art on her face.33岁的音乐爱好者纳塔利•莎普在自己的脸上重现了唱片封面的艺术，以此向那些最好的唱片封面致敬。
 
She asked her Facebook friends for suggestions and finally drilled the 40-plus best suggestions down to eight.她问了Facebook上好友的建议，最后从40多个最佳候封面选中选出了8个。
 
Mike Oldfields – Tubular bells麦克•欧菲尔德 - 《管钟》
 
Natalie said: "The hardest by far was Mike Oldfields – Tubular bells. Painting the straight lines of the bent silver bell over my face would only work If I continued to look straight into my handheld magnifying mirror.纳塔利说：“目前为止最难画的是麦克•欧菲尔德的《管钟》。我只有把脸正对着手里的凹面镜才可以在脸上画出弯曲银管的直线。”
 
King Crimson – The Court of the Crimson King克里姆森国王 - 《克里姆森国王的宫殿》
 
"However Painting King Crimson and Peter Gabriel was an absolute joy as they're both very painterly. In fact I barely used my brushes for King Crimson, I would just keep smudging it with my fingers."“画克里姆森国王和彼得•盖布瑞尔真的很好玩，因为他们都很有绘画风格。其实我画克里姆森国王的时候没有用刷子，全都是用手指涂抹的。”
 
Peter Gabriel – Melt彼得•盖布瑞尔 - 《融化》
 
The musician who uses the alter-ego Lone Taxidermist also works as a make-up artist, so thought Record Store Day seemed like a good way of merging both of her passions.纳塔利除了是以Lone Taxidermist（孤独的动物剥制员）为艺名的音乐家，还是一名化妆艺术家，所以她觉得“唱片店日”是个融合她两个爱好的好时机。
 
Natalie, from east London, said: "One of the reasons why I love vinyl is because of its true long playing physical format. I decided to listen to each album in full from start to end over and over again until the face was complete."纳塔利来自伦敦东。她说：“我喜欢唱片的原因之一是唱片的物理形式让我可以一直听。每张唱片我都会从头到尾不停地重复听，直到我把脸画完。”
 
She added: "Every time the album finished I would have a glass of wine! But I was getting too drunk especially after Human League!"她还说：“每听完一次我都会喝一杯酒！但是我会喝醉，特别是画完人类联盟乐队之后！”
 
Nirvana – Nevermind涅槃乐队 - 《别介意》
 
Nirvana's album Nevermind gave us classic tracks like Smells Like Teen Spirit, Lithium and Come As You Are, but it is just as known for its classic sleeve.涅槃乐队的唱片《别介意》里有像《Smells Like Teen Spirit》和《Lithium and Come As You Are》这样的经典歌曲，而它的封面也是同样经典。
 
One of the all time iconic album sleeves is the Velvet Underground album which featured songstress Nico on vocals was also best known for featuring one of Andy Warhol's prints of a banana on the album sleeve.地下丝绒乐队的唱片封面是历史上最有标志性的唱片封面之一。乐队出名的除了女主唱妮可，还有他们唱片封面上安迪•沃霍尔画的香蕉。
 
The Velvet Underground & Nico地下丝绒乐队 和 妮可
 
Not all the album covers saw her covering her face like this Human League classic which originally featured Phil Oakey's face in the middle.不是所有的唱片封面都把她的脸盖住了，这张人类联盟乐队的经典就没有。原封面的中间本来画的是菲尔•奥克利。
 
Human League – Dare人类联盟乐队 - 《敢》
 
Annette Peacock's I'm The One was a perfect choice as the album originally featured a striking green face:安妮特•皮科克的《我就是那个人》是个好选择，因为它原本就是一张引人注目的绿脸。
 
Annette Peacock – I'm the One安妮特•皮科克 - 《我就是那个人》
 
And Talk Talk's The Party's Over gave amazing realism to her facepaint as she looked like a crying clown:Talk Talk的《派对结束》画在脸上有惊人的现实主义效果，她看起来像是一个正在哭泣的小丑：
 
Talk Talk – The Party's OverTalk Talk - 《派对结束》
 
Bjork's Volta was a more challenging prospect for the artist but pulled it off with this striking effort:比约克的《回》对纳塔利来说更有挑战性，而她制造出了这样惊人的效果：
 
Bjork – Volta比约克 - 《回》
 
The Aphex Twin's album must have been one of the easiest to do:艾菲克斯•吐温的唱片一定是最容易画的：
 
Aphex Twin – Selected Ambient Works 85 – 92艾菲克斯•吐温 - 《85-92氛围音乐精选》
 
But recreating Grace Jones' famous pose was surely one of the most difficult but she made a better job of it than Kim Kardashian!重现葛蕾丝•琼斯的著名姿势无疑是最有难度的，不过她做得比金•卡戴珊还要好！
 
Grace Jones – Island Life葛蕾丝•琼斯 - 《岛上生活》

title: 绝妙艺术再现 经典唱片封面脸上画

description:
Useful tips: (suitable for all questions)
 
Make it NATURAL, pauses, such as "well", "urn", and "you know", are advisable, but don't do it too much.
 
CORRECT your mistakes as soon as you find out, for example, "... I really like standing in, I mean, ON the mountain,"(I know it's a bad example. What I'm trying to clarify is that it is OK to make mistakes, but you gotta correct it once you made it.) so the examiner would not count down your score.
 
There is NO NEED to use freaking words, like "exonerate", which means absolve, and "flamboyant", which means showy. But those words are good to use in your essay.
 
"The FIRST way, the LAST way, the NEVER FAILING way to develop self-confidence in speaking is-TO SPEAK."        -Dale Carnegie

Independent speaking (Question 1 & 2)

In this section, you are asked to present your own opinion and provide examples to support your ideas.

Useful tips:
 
Your answer should he as SPECIFIC as possible. You need to stick to a point UNTIL you finish it, have done with it, and need never return to it again.
 
The key to score high is to make each point WELL-DEVELOPED, and that DOES NOT mean you need to make as much points as you can, two would be great.
 
Truth and REASONABLE LIES are totally acceptable.
 
"DO NOT say "I have three (or whatever) reasons to support my idea", or some thing like that after you state your opinion. There is no guarantee that you are able to finish your answer within 45 seconds. Instead, you can say "I have a couple of reasons to say."

Question 1

Your answer can go like this:

"Personally, I would have to say that, um, my favorite ... is .... And there are a couple of reasons to name. The most important thing is that, you know,.... What's more,.... So that's why...."

Question 2

Your answer can go like this:

"Well, in my opinion, I would definitely agree with the point that, um,.... The first reason that I wanna say is that.... More importantly,.... So, uh, that's why I choose ... for the two reasons listed above."

Integrated speaking (Question 3, 4, 5 & 6)

In this part, you are asked to paraphrase the man/woman's attitude first, and then list the reasons s/he gives. In QUESTION 3, you are NOT asked to present your opinion towards this problem. However, in QUESTION 5, you REALLY need to make a choice between the solutions that the man/woman gives.
